description: Over the last few weeks, the market value of leading stablecoins has experienced a notable increase. title: UAE regulator acknowledges full cooperation from Islamic Coin issuer
description: In a notable development in the UAE’s digital asset market, the Virtual Assets Regulatory Authority (VARA) has acknowledged the full cooperation of Bored Gen DMCC (BG), the entity associated with Islamic Coin.  VARA says BG must maintain regular engagement VARA’s investigation, focusing on the issuance and distribution of Islamic Coin, revealed that BG has undertaken ...
